title: Design for Textile-Barber Pole, Series #1070
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Felt tip markers, brown colored pencil on white tracing paper
description: Brown, blue, black and pink rhomboids, or lozenge shapes, arranged in rows. Brown shapes numbered "2"; Blue shapes numbered "3"; Pink shapes numbered "1"
name: Drawing
